thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Downtown Manhattan/World Trade Center Area - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing value and service
thread.title_full: Amazing value and service - Review of Residence Inn New York Downtown Manhattan/World Trade Center Area, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David L
title: Amazing value and service
text:
A real gem amoungst some really expensive and unfriendly hotels in NYC. From the moment I arrived I was treated like an old friend, friendly,welcoming and efficient. The room was large and well appointed with a fridge freezer, microwave and dishwasher. Breakfast was included and was fresh and adequate
Will defenetly be returning
